title: Cafe-Restaurant Ho Chi Minh City
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, Organic, Beer/Wine, Take-out, European, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. A grand cafe, with a relaxed atmosphere, aptly named after its location. Serves a healthy mix of authentic world wide classics and contemporary Continental cuisine with a forward-thinking flair. An open kitchen creates a theatrical dining experience. Vegan and vegetarian dishes are marked with the same green dot, so vegans please inquire. Located across from Ben Thanh Market.
